author: raz
title: Marketing Training for African SPOs
description: It's challenging being the 1st SPO in a country, on top of technical skills, SPOs need marketing + managerial skills to operate sustainably.
solution: Capacity building enabling pioneering SPOs in DRC + Ivory Coast to operate sustainably with social media, marketing + managerial skills
experience: Educators | Wada | Social Entrepreneurs | Plutus Developer | Emurgo Foundations of Blockchain with Cardano Overview Certified
